body: Your battle prowess frightens friend and foe alike.
name: Terrorizing Display
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Hobgoblins/New Racial Rules/Hobgoblin Feats/Terrorizing Display

sections.body: Dazzling Display, Demoralizing Lash, Taskmaster, Weapon Focus, Intimidate 10 ranks, hobgoblin, proficiency with selected weapon.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you use Dazzling Display, in addition to its normal effects, you can use it to spur allies within 30 feet as if you had used the Taskmaster feat. Use the same Intimidate check to determine the effects of Dazzling Display and this feat.
